semantic_identifier: [GOLD-35]: Add confidence intervals to Fit Score explainability output
title: Add confidence intervals to Fit Score explainability output

sections.text: Implement confidence interval calculation and surfacing for segment and account-level Fit Scores in the explainability payload. Update the scoring service to return interval bounds and ensure the API/SDK response includes them in a backwards-compatible way. Add basic unit tests to validate interval generation across low-signal and high-signal segments.
